name: 賀一平
objective:
課程重點：(1)藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
This course is designed (1) to strengthen students' previously required knowledge in English with basic grammatical ideas and sentence patterns reviewed through reading materials appropriate to their levels; (2) to develop reading skill by giving explanation of difficult words, phrases, and syntax, as well as analysis of basic writing skill; (3)to  familiarize students with useful expressions in conversation and build up their confidence in cross-cultural communication; (4)to reinforce the competence and performance of listening, speaking, reading and writing by practice.
schedule:
Week 1   Orientation and English for Tourism
Week 2   Vocabulary and Part of Speech
Week 3   Unit One & Listening Comprehension (Photographs)
Week 4   Unit Two & Listening Comprehension (Question--Response)
Week 5   Reading Comprehension: Incomplete Sentences (Grammar and Sentence Patterns)
Week 6   Reading Comprehension: Text Completion (Cloze Test)
Week 7: Reading Comprehension: Reading Comprehension (Reading Comprehension)
Week 8: Listening Comprehension (Conversations) & Review
Week 9: Review; General Exam & Mid-term Exam 
Week 10: Unit Three
Week 11:  Journalistic English
Week 12: English for Tourism
Week 13: Unit Four
Week 14: Reading Comprehension (Vocabulary and Sentence Patterns)
Week 15: Reading Comprehension (Cloze Test and Reading Passages)
Week 16: Listening Comprehension: Talks and Conversations
Week 17: A review 
Week 18: Review & Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Mid-term Exam: 20%
General English Proficiency Test: 20%
Final Exam: 20%
Attendance, classroom tasks and assignments: 40%
materials: Reading Explorer 2 (第三版, 2020出版) by David Bohlke; Paul MacIntyre (海學出版社: http://www.hilanguage.com.tw/ )
